extensionDescription.message: Choose where tabs appear, and what happens when they disappear.

statusSaved.description: Status message shown when settings are saved.

resetSettingTooltip.description: Tooltip for the reset button beside each setting.

resetAllButton.description: Button label to reset all settings to their default values.

newTabPositionLabel.message: When opening the New Tab page:
newTabPositionLabel.description: Label for the new chrome://newtab position setting.

foregroundLinkPositionLabel.message: When opening a link in the foreground:
foregroundLinkPositionLabel.description: Label for the foreground link position setting.

backgroundTabPositionLabel.description: Label for the background link position setting.

afterCloseActivationLabel.message: After closing a tab, switch to:
afterCloseActivationLabel.description: Label for the post-close tab activation behavior.

optionDefault.description: Option to use Chrome's default behavior.

optionCreateBeforeActive.description: Option to open the tab before the currently active tab.

optionCreateAfterActive.description: Option to open the tab after the currently active tab.

optionCreateWindowFirst.description: Option to open the tab as the first in the window.

optionCreateWindowLast.description: Option to open the tab as the last in the window.

optionActivateBeforeRemoved.description: Option to activate the tab to the left of the closed tab.

optionActivateAfterRemoved.description: Option to activate the tab to the right of the closed tab.

optionActivateWindowFirst.description: Option to open the first tab after closing a tab.

optionActivateWindowLast.description: Option to open the last tab after closing a tab.

optionActivateActivationHistory.description: Option to activate the previously activated tab after closing a tab.
